rows.label: tlk41200123_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Um, my trainer's kind of having
a bit of trouble right now...

rows.label: tlk41200123_05_msg0002
rows.name:
They're not really getting along
with their Blade.

rows.label: tlk41200123_05_msg0003
rows.name:
They go everywhere together, they
work together, fight together...but
they just don't seem to connect.

rows.label: tlk41200123_05_msg0004
rows.name:
But I don't think that's true. If you keep
on fighting, even if it feels like the day'll
never come, someday you'll click!

rows.label: tlk41200123_05_msg0005
rows.name:
That's not something your average
Driver's able to do, though...

rows.label: tlk41200123_05_msg0006
rows.name:
But if you could deepen your bond that
far...just think of the possibilities!
